name: factory_tree_node_app
description: Factory tree node app written using MERN stack

scripts.deploy: yarn build && git add . && git commit -m "Building for production" && git push heroku master
scripts.tsdeploy: yarn build && git add . && git commit -m "Building for production" && git push heroku heroku-dep-ts:master
scripts.initialload: yarn install && cd client && yarn install && cd ..
